cases.title: Career site built in React. Client: Comprend
cases.description: Created a career page for the consultancy company Comprend. By using Comprend's internal career API four different pages was built and linked with React Router. Demo of project at the Comprend office.

cases.title: Radio player built in React using SR:s API
cases.description: Created a working radio player by using Sveriges Radio API. Information about the radio channels is fetched as well as playable audio stream urls.

cases.title: Clock built in React
cases.description: Built a clock by using state in React. Two buttons can be clicked to paus the clock and make the clock run again. A JavaScript function makes the background change based on the time of the day.

cases.title: News webpage using Google News API. Client: Bonnier News
cases.description: Built a sustainability themed news webpage for Bonnier News. Data was fetched from the Google News API to show multiple articles with toggle function on the site. Demo of project at the Bonnier News office

cases.title: Product listing with React
cases.description: Built an webpage with the look of an e-commerce store in React. A JSON-file with multiple pharmacy products is used to render a React component for each product. A hover effect displays more information about the product.

cases.title: VAT Calculator built in React
cases.description: Built a VAT calculator in React
